posts.post_content:
Cabinet Card of player Sulivan(?possible, inked on back), likely late 1800's or early 1900. Striped hat, holding ball up to chest.   
WILSON Studio, New Albany, Indiana(the studio did cabinets 1800's to early 1900's by name of Wilson and Son)
....4-1/4 x 6-1/2 inches....
nice front image....crease left lower corner(visible on back). Left upper corner dinged. Typical wear of cabinet. 
Asking $105

Know this is not baseball/sports but I have these 12 used Old judge(and others) tobacco from late 1800's. They are obviously removed from photo album. Most are skinned of the back and one is in 2 pieces. Beat up to say the least but if anyone wants them. Can have these pieces at $5 each or total of $50 for the lot....(before someone says something, I know there is a non sport section but I'd rather someone here have them if they are interested, and cheap).

Gonna finalize it at $105 on the Cabinet if anyone interested. 
The other 12 beat up old judge, etc can go for $50
Money order or check please.

Thanks
